snippet: On an 86-degree day, the automaker opened a life-size snow globe adjacent to the High Line, complete with skating rink, to promote its new all-wheel-drive system.
abstract: On an 86-degree day, the automaker opened a life-size snow globe adjacent to the High Line, complete with skating rink, to promote its new all-wheel-drive system.

headline.main: Jaguar Hunts for Traction in Chelsea and Beyond
